timeline.message:
EQL: Improve request logging

Add logging to multi-search queries
Log response count

timeline.bodyText: Why getTotalHits() wasn't the best option?
timeline.author: astefan

replies.bodyText: It requires accurate counts - if total hits is disabled (don't track hits), it returns null. Plus it does not tell you the number of results returned but rather the total number of results found.
replies.author: costin
